response.overview: When a man's daughter is suddenly taken during a championship hockey game – with the captors demanding a billion dollars by game's end – he frantically sets a plan in motion to rescue her and abort an impending explosion before the final buzzer.
response.title: Sudden Death

titles.title: ซัดเดน เดท ตัดเส้นตายท้านรก

results.name: Sudden Death Official Trailer #1 - Jean-Claude Van Damme Movie (1995) HD
